dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 9251 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 6444 San Fernando Road in Glendale, California, as the “Paul Ignatius Post Office”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Schiff (for himself, Ms. Barragán, Ms. Bass, Mr. Carbajal, Mr. Costa, Mr. Gomez, Mr. Huffman, Ms. Jacobs of California, Ms. Lee of California, Mr. Lowenthal, Mr. McNerney, Mrs. Napolitano, Mr. Panetta, Mr. Ruiz, Mr. Sherman, Mr. Swalwell, Mr. Takano, and Mr. Thompson of California) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Reform

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 6444 San Fernando Road in Glendale, California, as the Paul Ignatius Post Office.

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 6444 San Fernando Road in Glendale, California, shall be known and designated as the Paul Ignatius Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Paul Ignatius Post Office.
